name: Goose
title: block.github.io/goose
shortDescription: Goose is a local AI agent designed to automate a variety of engineering tasks, from debugging to deployment. It is built with transparency and collaboration in mind, allowing developers to contribute and customize freely. An example use case involves creating custom CLI commands to handle specific tasks, such as downloading in-line comments on PRs, which showcases its ability to simplify complex processes.
pros: Runs locally for efficient task execution
Highly customizable with external API connectivity
cons: Requires technical knowledge to set up and customize
Limited by the capabilities of connected APIs
